meanings.definition: A type of marine invertebrate related to sea lilies and starfish.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the cystoids to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium had a tank filled with colorful cystoids for visitors to admire.
meanings.sent3: The playful children pretended to be cystoids crawling on the ocean floor.
meanings.sent4: In the ancient seas, cystoids danced gracefully like underwater flowers.
meanings.sent5: The textbook had a detailed illustration of different types of cystoids.

meanings.definition: Fossilized remains of extinct marine animals resembling sea lilies.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a collection of beautifully preserved cystoids.
meanings.sent2: Paleontologists discovered rare cystoids fossils in the rocky cliffs.
meanings.sent3: The archaeologist jokingly called the fossilized cystoids 'ancient sea aliens'.
meanings.sent4: The beachcomber imagined the cliffs as a graveyard of petrified cystoids.
meanings.sent5: The documentary showcased the process of uncovering ancient cystoids fossils.
